```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy import linalg
>>> a = np.array([[-3, -2, 0], [-1, -1, 0], [0, -5, -1]])
>>> b = np.array([2, 4, -1])
>>> q = np.eye(3)
>>> x = linalg.solve_continuous_lyapunov(a, q)
>>> x
array([[ -0.75  ,   0.875 ,  -3.75  ],
 [  0.875 ,  -1.375 ,   5.3125],
 [ -3.75  ,   5.3125, -27.0625]])
>>> np.allclose(a.dot(x) + x.dot(a.T), q)
True 
```
